thread.title: Aaron Davidson announces Aaronsview No-Wait Photo Service
thread.title_full: Aaron Davidson announces Aaronsview No-Wait Photo Service - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Aaron Davidson announces Aaronsview No-Wait Photo Service
text:
Photos Delivered in Digital Format After Event
Miami Beach, FL (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
Imagine the convenience of getting your photos right after your event. No more waiting. Aaronsview now offers “No Wait Photo Service”. Whether it’s a birthday party or a corporate event, all clients will get their photos at the end of the assignment.
High profile photographer Aaron Davidson brings his expertise to all his assignments ranging from intimate family portraits and gatherings to corporate events, conferences and receptions. Aaron is flexible and attentive to the clients’ needs; no job is too large or small.
Aaron is a top choice contributor to some of the world’s largest photo agencies, including Getty Images, WireImage and FilmMagic. Davidson’s photographs have appeared in such publications as Star Magazine, US Weekly, People, Variety, E!, Daily Mail, USA Today and the New York Times.
His corporate clients include Art Basel, Johnnie Walker, Moet & Chandon, NBC, Sirius XM, and Warner Brothers. He has photographed such notable events as the Miami Book Fair, Sundance Film Festival, NBA All-Star Weekend, the Ultra Music Festival, Miami Tennis Open, and the South Beach Wine and Food Festival.
At 26 years old, Davidson has been a photographer for half his life, seven years as a professional where he has been documenting high-profile gatherings. Aaron’s gift for images goes well beyond his degree in Film, Television and Digital Production and has been widely acclaimed from a very early age for photography and videography, including artistic and documentary projects. He has been a fixture at the premiere, social, cultural, and high profile events in South Florida and around the country for the past seven years.
"The client’s satisfaction is always paramount,” said Davidson. “My priority is to be flexible, fast, efficient and most of all, to follow the client’s directions. I communicate with the client throughout the shoot, ensuring I get every shot, pose, or perspective they want.” Expert photo editing is also available.
The highly acclaimed photographer also notes a key element to his service: “The wires, magazines and celebrity blogs want their images right away so they can publish and post immediately in print and social media. My private clients will get the same immediate access. Whether on a thumb drive or electronically delivered, the images will be available for them to enjoy and share right away. This is my solution to the age old question, ‘When will my pictures be ready?”
Miami Beach-based Aaronsview is located minutes from the Miami Beach Convention Center, downtown Miami and the Miami Beach hotels. Davidson is available for last-minute assignments and he is willing to travel throughout South Florida, including Miami and Broward counties, and Palm Beach.
If you’d like to learn more about Aaronsview, please visit: aaronsview.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/AaronsView/Photography/prweb13032652.htm
